actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide a tax credit for individuals for expenses incurred for neighborhood patrols provided by neighborhood associations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a nonrefundable individual income tax credit for 50 percent of amounts paid or incurred for neighborhood patrol assessments. Limits the amount of the credit to $150.

titles.title: A bill to provide a tax credit for individuals for expenses incurred for neighborhood patrols provided by neighborhood associations.
